Quotes.author: Carol Burnett
Quotes.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

Quotes.author: Carol Burnett
Quotes.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing -- that's why we recommend it daily.

Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
Quotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

Quotes.author: Estée Lauder
Quotes.quote: I didn’t get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.

Quotes.author: Steve Jobs
Quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

Quotes.author: Stephen Covey
Quotes.quote: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it’s holy ground. There’s no greater investment.

Quotes.author: Denise Brennan-Nelsonr
Quotes.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.

Quotes.author: Edith Wharton
Quotes.quote: Beware of monotony; it’s the mother of all the deadly sins.

Quotes.author: J.M. Barrie
Quotes.quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.

Quotes.author: Don Peppers
Quotes.quote: Without a customer, you don’t have a business -- all you have is a hobby.

Quotes.author: Tom Abbott
Quotes.quote: It's not just about being better. It's about being different. You need to give people a reason to choose your business.

Quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk
Quotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.

Quotes.author: Simon Sinek
Quotes.quote: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stressed; working hard for something we love is called passion.

Quotes.author: Lucille Ball
Quotes.quote: I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done

Quotes.author: Bette Davis
Quotes.quote: The key to life is accepting challenges. Once someone stops doing this, he’s dead.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.

Quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine
Quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
Quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.

Quotes.author: Julie Andrews
Quotes.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.

Quotes.author: Travis Bradberry
Quotes.quote: Grit is that ‘extra something’ that separates the most successful people from the rest. It’s the passion, perseverance, and stamina that we must channel in order to stick with our dreams until they become a reality.

Quotes.author: George Eliot
Quotes.quote: Failure after long perseverance is much grander than never to have a striving good enough to be called a failure.

Quotes.author: Pearl Buck
Quotes.quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word -- excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.

Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
Quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
Quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

Quotes.author: Ayn Rand
Quotes.quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

Quotes.author: J. Paul Getty
Quotes.quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.

Quotes.author: Henry Ford
Quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

Quotes.author: Kenneth J Hutchins
Quotes.quote: It is your determination and persistence that will make you a successful person.

Quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes
Quotes.quote: You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.

Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.

Quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg
Quotes.quote: Done is better than perfect.

Quotes.author: Walt Disney
Quotes.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.

Quotes.author: Will Rogers
Quotes.quote: Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don't Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: It's Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It's Whether You Get Up.

Quotes.author: Steve Jobs
Quotes.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don't Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.

Quotes.author: Rob Siltanen
Quotes.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.

Quotes.author: Og Mandino
Quotes.quote: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.

Quotes.author: Mohnish Pabrai
Quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs Are Great At Dealing With Uncertainty And Also Very Good At Minimizing Risk. That's The Classic Entrepreneur.

Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
Quotes.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.

Quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
Quotes.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?

Quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link
Quotes.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.

Quotes.author: Henry Ford
Quotes.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.

Quotes.author: Hasidic Proverb
Quotes.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.

Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.

Quotes.author: Don Zimmer
Quotes.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.

Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Develop An 'Attitude Of Gratitude'. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.

Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
Quotes.quote: “You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.

Quotes.author: Confucious
Quotes.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The Future Belongs To The Competent. Get Good, Get Better, Be The Best!

Quotes.author: Jack Canfield
Quotes.quote: For Every Reason It's Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.

Quotes.author: John Wooden
Quotes.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out

Quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quotes.quote: A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.

Quotes.author: Michael Phelps
Quotes.quote: I Think Goals Should Never Be Easy, They Should Force You To Work, Even If They Are Uncomfortable At The Time.

Quotes.author: Michelle Obama
Quotes.quote: One Of The Lessons That I Grew Up With Was To Always Stay True To Yourself And Never Let What Somebody Else Says Distract You From Your Goals.

Quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
Quotes.quote: Today's Accomplishments Were Yesterday’s Impossibilities.

Quotes.author: Steve Jobs
Quotes.quote: The Only Way To Do Great Work Is To Love What You Do. If You Haven't Found It Yet, Keep Looking. Don't Settle

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: You Don't Have To Be Great To Start, But You Have To Start To Be Great.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: A Clear Vision, Backed By Definite Plans, Gives You A Tremendous Feeling Of Confidence And Personal Power.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: There Are No Limits To What You Can Accomplish, Except The Limits You Place On Your Own Thinking.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Integrity Is The Most Valuable And Respected Quality Of Leadership. Always Keep Your Word.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leadership Is The Ability To Get Extraordinary Achievement From Ordinary People

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Set High Standards. Refuse To Tolerate Mediocrity Or Poor Performance

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Clarity Is The Key To Effective Leadership. What Are Your Goals?

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The Best Leaders Have A High Consideration Factor. They Really Care About Their People

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Think And Talk About The Solutions. Followers Think And Talk About The Problems.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The Key Responsibility Of Leadership Is To Think About The Future. No One Else Can Do It For You.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The Effective Leader Recognizes That They Are More Dependent On Their People Than They Are On Them. Walk Softly.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Never Use The Word Failure. They Look Upon Setbacks As Learning Experiences.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Practice Golden Rule Management In Everything You Do. Manage Others The Way You Would Like To Be Managed.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Superior Leaders Are Willing To Admit A Mistake And Cut Their Losses. Be Willing To Admit That You've Changed Your Mind. Don’t Persist When The Original Decision Turns Out To Be A Poor One.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Are Anticipatory Thinkers. They Consider All Consequences Of Their Behaviors Before They Act.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The True Test Of Leadership Is How Well You Function In A Crisis.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Concentrate Single-Mindedly On One Thing– The Most Important Thing, And They Stay At It Until It’s Complete.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: The Three ‘C’s’ Of Leadership Are Consideration, Caring, And Courtesy. Be Polite To Everyone.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Respect Is The Key Determinant Of High-Performance Leadership. How Much People Respect You Determines How Well They Perform.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leadership Is More Who You Are Than What You Do.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Entrepreneurial Leadership Requires The Ability To Move Quickly When Opportunity Presents Itself.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Are Innovative, Entrepreneurial, And Future-Oriented. They Focus On Getting The Job Done.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Leaders Are Never Satisfied; They Continually Strive To Be Better.

Quotes.author: Confucius
Quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

Quotes.author: Walt Disney
Quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

Quotes.author: Confucius
Quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

Quotes.author: George Addair
Quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
Quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
Quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

Quotes.author: Paulo Coelho
Quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up.

Quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland
Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.

Quotes.author: Brian Tracy
Quotes.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.

Quotes.author: W. Clement Stone
Quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

Quotes.author: Les Brown
Quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

Quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
Quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.

Quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle
Quotes.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.

Quotes.author: Les Brown
Quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.

Quotes.author: Bob Riley
Quotes.quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.

Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.

Quotes.author: Francis of Assisi
Quotes.quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

Quotes.author: Florence Nightingale
Quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

Quotes.author: Tony Robbins
Quotes.quote: Whatever you hold in your mind on a consistent basis is exactly what you will experience in your life.

Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
Quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.

Quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

Quotes.author: Newt Gingrich
Quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.

Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

Quotes.author: Stephen Covey
Quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.

Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
Quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

Quotes.author: Joel Osteen
Quotes.quote: You’re going to go through tough times – that’s life. But I say, ‘Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.’ See the positive in negative events.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.

Quotes.author: Jack Canfield
Quotes.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.

Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
Quotes.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

Quotes.author: Jim Rohn
Quotes.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

Quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis
Quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

Quotes.author: Jillian Michaels
Quotes.quote: It’s not about perfect. It’s about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that’s where transformation happens. That’s how change occurs.

Quotes.author: Pele
Quotes.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

Quotes.author: Rikki Rogers
Quotes.quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.

Quotes.author: Denis Waitley
Quotes.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

Quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis
Quotes.quote: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.

Quotes.author: P. T. Barnum
Quotes.quote: Fortune always favors the brave, and never helps a man who does not help himself.

Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
Quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.

Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

Quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
Quotes.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.

Quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen
Quotes.quote: You control your future, your destiny. What you think about comes about. By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands – your own.

Quotes.author: Og Mandino
Quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
Quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

Quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti
Quotes.quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.

Quotes.author: Tony Robbins
Quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step into turning the invisible into the visible.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.

Quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy
Quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly

Quotes.author: Dalai Lama
Quotes.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Staying positive does not mean that things will turn out okay. Rather it is knowing that you will be okay no matter how things turn out.

Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, ‘I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: No matter how hard times may get, always hold your head up and be strong; show them you’re not as weak as they think you are.

Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
Quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

Quotes.author: Mark Twain
Quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the things you did.

Quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

Quotes.author: Dalai Lama
Quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision

Quotes.author: Steve Jobs
Quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Be so happy that when others look at you they become happy too.

Quotes.author: Joshua Marine
Quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

Quotes.author: Estee Lauder
Quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.

Quotes.author: Eric Thomas
Quotes.quote: You cannot afford to live in potential for the rest of your life; at some point, you have to unleash the potential and make your move.

Quotes.author: George Eliot
Quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

Quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel
Quotes.quote: There is no greater disability in society than the inability to see a person as more.

Quotes.author: Swati Sharma
Quotes.quote: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal, you do not change your decision to get there.

Quotes.author: Socrates
Quotes.quote: The Secret of Change Is to Focus All of Your Energy, Not on Fighting the Old, But on Building the New

Quotes.author: Winston Churchill
Quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

Quotes.author: Charles Buxton
Quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.

Quotes.author: Michaelangelo
Quotes.quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.

Quotes.author: Mark Twain
Quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Free yourself from your past mistakes, by forgiving yourself for what you have done or went through. Every day is another chance to start over.

Quotes.author: J.R. Rim
Quotes.quote: It is less about becoming a better person, and more of being better, as a person.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: You can’t litter negativity everywhere and then wonder why you’ve got a trashy life.

Quotes.author: Vivian Greene
Quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but learning to dance in the rain.

Quotes.author: Jim Rohn
Quotes.quote: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you’ll find a way to get it.

Quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz
Quotes.quote: If you can see yourself as an artist, and you can see that your life is your own creation, then why not create the most beautiful story for yourself?

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Free yourself from your past mistakes, by forgiving yourself for what you have done or went through. Every day is another chance to start over.

Quotes.author: Joshua Marine
Quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

Quotes.author: Tony Robbins
Quotes.quote: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.

Quotes.author: Lionel Suggs
Quotes.quote: I find it sad that too many do not understand themselves, or their potential. They don’t even take the time to get to know their unconsciousness. You can truly learn so much, by simply getting to know the “you” that is behind the reality of yourself.

Quotes.author: Joel Osteen
Quotes.quote: Who you spend your time with will have a great impact on what kind of life you live. Spend time with the right people.

Quotes.author: Susan C. Young
Quotes.quote: When change happens, you have a choice for how you are going to respond. You can either lose your composure and react impetuously or use the event or situation as a learning opportunity to shift your mindset and respond appropriately. Begin to notice your responses when changes occur and do your best to choose a breakthrough over a breakdown.

Quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder
Quotes.quote: If you chase anything in life chase the things that get you excited about living. Chase the things that give you hope, happiness and a glimpse of a better life. Chase the things that make you want to be a better person. Chase the things that inspire you to think, create and live joyfully. Chase the things that reinforce in your soul that you can make a difference. Chase the things that make you want to transform your heart from selfish to selfless. When you chase that kind of storm you are chasing rainbows.

Quotes.author: Mandy Hale
Quotes.quote: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like and enjoying it for everything that it is.

Quotes.author: Julius Caesar
Quotes.quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.

Quotes.author: Dr Seuss
Quotes.quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

Quotes.author: Cornel West
Quotes.quote: We have to recognize that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.

Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
Quotes.quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.

Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
Quotes.quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you’re ordinary.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: The best kiss is the one that has been exchanged a thousand times between the eyes before it reaches the lips.

Quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy
Quotes.quote: When you love someone, you love the person as they are, and not as you’d like them to be.

Quotes.author: Peter Drucker
Quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

Quotes.author: Scott Belsky
Quotes.quote: It’s not about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.

Quotes.author: Daymond John
Quotes.quote: As an entrepreneur, you never stop learning.

Quotes.author: Tony Hsieh
Quotes.quote: Chase the vision, not the money. The money will end up following you.

Quotes.author: Jack Ma
Quotes.quote: We are never in lack of money. We lack people with dreams who can die for those dreams.

Quotes.author: Elon Musk
Quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Quotes.author: Bob Burg
Quotes.quote: All things equal, people will do business with, and refer business to, people they know trust and like.

Quotes.author: Richard Branson
Quotes.quote: From my very first day as an entrepreneur, I’ve felt the only mission worth pursuing in business is to make people’s lives better.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffet
Quotes.quote: It takes twenty years to build a reputation. And five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you’ll do things differently.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Success in life comes when you simply refuse to give up, with goals so strong that obstacles, failure, and loss only act as motivation.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Grind while they sleep. Learn while they party. Live like they dream.

Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
Quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up.

Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
Quotes.quote: I’ve learned that making a ‘living’ is not the same thing as ‘making a life’.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Every job is a self portrait of a person who does it. Autograph your work with excellence.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Don’t be busy. Be productive.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: If the plan doesn’t work, change the plan. But never the goal.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Ability: is what you are capable of doing. Motivation: determines what you do. Attitude: determines how well you do it.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: To do great work is to love what you do.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: You will never always be motivated. You have to learn to be disciplined.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Working hard for something we don’t care about is called stress. Working hard for something we love is called passion.

Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
Quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.

Quotes.author: M. Scott Peck
Quotes.quote: The truth is that our finest moments are most likely to occur when we are feeling deeply uncomfortable, unhappy, or unfulfilled. For it is only in such moments, propelled by our discomfort, that we are likely to step out of our ruts and start searching for different ways or truer answers.

Quotes.author: Katherine Whitehorn
Quotes.quote: Find out what you like doing best, and get someone to pay you for doing it.

Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: It never gets easier. You just get better.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Look in the mirror. That’s your competition.

Quotes.author: Jim Rohn
Quotes.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

Quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quotes.quote: Confidence comes from discipline and training.

Quotes.author: Luis Galarza
Quotes.quote: Success is what comes after your stop making excuses.

Quotes.author: Tony Robbins
Quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step into turning the invisible into the visible.

Quotes.author: Unkown
Quotes.quote: Results happen over time, not overnight. Work hard, stay consistent, and be patient.

Quotes.author: Paulo Coelho
Quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.

Quotes.author: Helen Keller
Quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go, just remember how far you have come. Remember everything you have faced, all the battles you have won, and all the fears you have overcome.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Starve your distractions. Feed your focus.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Excuses will always be there for you. Opportunity won’t.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Maturity comes when you stop making excuses and start making changes.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Your life is a school. Everything that happens is teaching you something. Pay attention.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: What you think of yourself is much more important than what people think of you.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.

Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
Quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

Quotes.author: Peter T. Mcintyre
Quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.

Quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis
Quotes.quote: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Challenges and obstacles are a part of life. They make us stronger and build character. If life were easy it would be boring and you would never grow.

Quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder
Quotes.quote: Your personal growth is the only thing that matters. You own and write your story; no one else does. Believe in the unique step up the mountain.

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: Failure doesn’t mean it’s over. It means try with more experience.

Quotes.author: Henry L. Doherty
Quotes.quote: Be a student as long as you still have something to learn, and this will mean all your life.

Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

Quotes.author: Unknown
Quotes.quote: What you want exists. Don’t settle until you get it.
